name: Music_2138.wav
keywords: ['piano song', 'violin', 'narration', 'male voice', 'romantic mood', 'no other instruments', 'slow tempo']
caption: This piano song features a piano playing the backing chords. A violin plays the main melody. The melody is romantic but turns eerie at the end. There are no other instruments in this song. A male voice narrates two words toward the end of the song. This song can be played in a promotional video.
